description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. An evil dude has unleashed the Zombie Bunnies and now you, HomeSlice, have to send them packing.  Slice and Shoot the Zombie Bunnies with high scores, unique game look, and play style.  Check it out now!
